mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMORY_ID , M.CONTENT , M.TITLE , M.CREATE_DATE , M.MODIFY_DATE , M.CATEGORY , M.TODO_YN , M.MEMBER_ID , M.SHOW_DIV , T.MEMORY_ID AS T_MEMORY_ID , T.SUCC_DATE AS T_SUCC_DATE , T.STR_DATE AS T_STR_DATE , T.END_DATE AS T_END_DATE FROM WC_MEMORY M LEFT OUTER JOIN WC_TODO T ON T.MEMORY_ID = M.MEMORY_ID WHERE M.SHOW_DIV = 'Y' AND M.MEMORY_ID = #{memoryId}

SELECT ROWNUM , MEMORY_ID , CONTENT , TITLE , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , CATEGORY , TODO_YN , MEMBER_ID , T_MEMORY_ID , T_SUCC_DATE , T_STR_DATE , T_END_DATE FROM ( SELECT M.MEMORY_ID , M.CONTENT , M.TITLE , M.CREATE_DATE , M.MODIFY_DATE , M.CATEGORY , M.TODO_YN , M.MEMBER_ID , T.MEMORY_ID AS T_MEMORY_ID , T.SUCC_DATE AS T_SUCC_DATE , T.STR_DATE AS T_STR_DATE , T.END_DATE AS T_END_DATE FROM WC_MEMORY M LEFT OUTER JOIN WC_TODO T ON T.MEMORY_ID = M.MEMORY_ID WHERE M.SHOW_DIV = 'Y'
AND ( M.TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchWord} || '%' OR M.CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{searchWord} || '%' )
ORDER BY NVL(MODIFY_DATE, CREATE_DATE) DESC ) MEM

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WC_MEMORY WHERE SHOW_DIV = 'Y'
AND ( TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchWord} || '%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{searchWord} || '%' )
